alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 17 at 2:08PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow mixed with some sleet will affect northeastern Piscataquis...eastern Aroostook and north central Penobscot Counties through mid-afternoon... At 203 PM EST...An area of heavy snow mixing with some sleet was moving into southeastern Aroostook County and moving north around 40 mph. Locations impacted include... Presque Isle, Caribou, Houlton, Fort Kent, Madawaska, Fort Fairfield, Limestone, Van Buren, Eagle Lake, Deboullie Mountain, Portage, Mapleton, Washburn, Mars Hill, Ashland, Easton, Woodland, Frenchville, Bridgewater and Smyrna. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 289 and 304. US Highway 1 between Houlton and Fort Kent. State Highway 11 between Knowles Corner and Fort Kent. * Winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. * Visibilities will drop to less than a quarter mile at times. * Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour area possible. A snow/sleet mixture on roads will create hazardous travel conditions.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook
